title: Ebro In The Morning - True Crime Congratulations  + Congressman Jamal Bowman Stops By
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 8/22/2022.

Ebro, Rosenberg, Laura Stylez and the crew are in the studio talking about their weekends, true crime stories, the gurus, and much more! 

Ebro in the Morning sits down with Congressman Jamaal Bowman to discuss his accomplishments representing  New York's 16th Congressional District, Midterm Elections, and The Rap Act. 

Early voting for the midterm primary election is underway until Aug. 21. August 23 is voting day. 

All that and more on Ebro In The Morning! 

Subscribe to "Summer Jam: Through The Years" - hosted by Laura Stylez!

iTunes: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/summer-jam-through-the-years/id1627066431 

Amazon: https://music.amazon.com/podcasts/6dfef9f3-4ff5-4d05-a857-6689c99aa999/summer-jam-through-the-years

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/7MP62llakMJSXkJzwFclgq

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
